Code: EXEC SQL SELECT t1.FONTE, t1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, t1.NRENDOS, t1.DATORR, t1.CODCAU, t1.CODSUBES, t1.NUM_APOLICE FROM SEGUROS.VG_DPS_PROPOSTA_HIST-MEST-HABIT01 t1, t2 WHERE t1.num_apol_sinistro = t2.num_apol_sinistro AND t2.operacao = :OPERACAO AND t2.ponto_venda = :PONTO_VENDA AND t2.num_contrato = :NUM_CONTRATO END SQL
